byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York.
byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump selects Exxon Mobil chief executive Rex W Tillerson as his nominee for secretary of state; Tillerson's confirmation in Senate will likely be contentious because of his close relationship with Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin.
lead_paragraph: In choosing the leader of an energy giant, President-elect Donald J. Trump is dismissing bipartisan concerns that Mr. Tillerson is too cozy with Vladimir V. Putin.
